name: GKGraphNode2D
desc: A node in a navigation graph, associated with a point in continuous 2D space.

items.name: init(point: vector_float2)
items.desc: Initializes a graph node with the specified point.

items.name: class func node(withPoint: vector_float2) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a graph node with the specified point.

items.name: var position: vector_float2
items.desc: The position of the node in continuous 2D space.
